name: Sudoku.org
description:
The Sudoku game is very popular, and there are many Sudoku game in Appstore. Which one are you satisfied with? We have collected a lot of users' opinions to develop this game. We are convinced that you would satisfy with this Sudoku game and would not delete it. Download it now, you can experience it why.

This app use computer generated method to generate Sudoku game. With customizable factor, you can simply control the difficult on your own.

And the input system is very convenient, every one would feel it is the best input way.

Battle mode is enabled. Now you can use Local area network to connect different device to create sudoku competition game.

p.s. All devices must on same Local area network, otherwise it unable to join the battle. If unable to find other player, please check your firewall setting.
